meanings.definition: The quality or state of having a musky odor.
meanings.sent1: The muskiness of the room made me think of a forest.
meanings.sent2: I love the muskiness of old books.
meanings.sent3: The muskiness of the cheese was so strong, it walked out of the fridge!
meanings.sent4: The muskiness of the attic was like a hidden treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The muskiness of the perfume lingered in the air long after she left.

meanings.sent1: The muskiness of the cologne reminded me of my grandfather.
meanings.sent2: She wrinkled her nose at the muskiness of the room.
meanings.sent3: The muskiness of the gym socks could be used as a weapon!
meanings.sent4: The muskiness of the forest enveloped me like a warm blanket.
meanings.sent5: The muskiness of the incense filled the temple with a sense of peace.
